alert.note: Alert for Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 10:59PM MDT until July 27 at 11:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washington County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1145 PM MDT. * At 1059 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Platner, or 8 miles east of Akron, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Otis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
